Product Name Caring Medical Protection Plus
Purchase Objectives and Needs
Prepare for future healthcare needs:
• To settle medical expenses; and
• To compensate for the loss of income during hospital confinement
Product Type Indemnity, but incorporated with non-indemnity cash benefits
Period of Cover 1 year
Enrolment Age 12 days to before 71st birthday
Policy Renewal Annual renewal up to age 99 (guaranteed)3
Policy Currency HK$
Plan Level for Basic Hospital and Surgical Benefits Premier (1)/Superior (2)/Standard (3)
Optional Benefits • Optional Outpatient Benefits
• Optional Dental Benefits
Cover Area Worldwide
[except for “Psychiatric Treatment (under Basic Hospital and Surgical Benefits)”, “Daily Hospital Cash Allowance” and “Cashless Arrangement for Gastroscopy and Colonoscopy”]
Cooling-off Period15 40 days
Payment Mode Annual/Semi-annual+/Monthly+
Underwriting No medical examination, health declaration or individual underwriting is required1
Pre-existing Conditions2 Guaranteed acceptance of conditions which are covered under the Blue Cross group medical insurance policy2
+  Semi-annual and monthly payment modes are not available for policies with Optional Outpatient Benefits.
Remarks:  For details of notes 1, 2, 3 and 15, please refer to “Points to Note”.
Notes:
1. The above information is for reference only. Please refer to policy for the exact terms and conditions and the full list of policy exclusions.
2. Should there be any discrepancy between the English and the Chinese versions of the above information, the English version shall apply and prevail.
3. The above product(s) is/are offered for sale in Hong Kong only and is/are underwritten by Blue Cross (Asia-Pacific) Insurance Limited, an authorised insurer in Hong Kong.
